title: Puthiyathalaimurai TV
creator: New Generation Media Corporation Private Limited

extendedInfo.description: Puthiyathalaimurai TV is a leading news channel broadcasting in Tamil language. It is especially broadcasting to watch the latest News covering national and international events. It also broadcasts many educational programs for learning as well as political programs. Puthiyathalaimurai TV is one best application which offers a compelling end-user experiences to view live TV on mobile devices. Here on this app, 24/7 hrs live streaming is available for you so keep watching and enjoying.Note: Android device should support RTSP playback streaming and Minimum API level is 8 is required in order to play the Puthiyathalaimurai TV application. If not the device will prompt to an error.

reviews.title: very nice app
reviews.comment: i use this app on my sgs2-skyrocket and its amazing. please see if you can release some updates that can fix the stream that stucks very rarely. otherwise pretty nice app.

reviews.title: Poor streaming of apps
reviews.comment: I am a big fan of puthiyathalaimurai. But streaming of this mobile app is damn poor. It works for just 2 min in few os and stops working in many others. I am happy  to reinstall if all these problems are sorted.
